Key Match Events: Pohjanpalo scored for Finland in the 17th minute
Liam Scales scored the first international goal for the Republic of Ireland in the 57th minute
Robbie Brady scored the winning goal for the Republic of Ireland in the 88th minute
Post-Match Reflections: This was the first time since 2011 that Ireland has come from behind to win away from home
Miscellaneous Highlights: Caoimhin Kelleher was called into action to make his first save in the 14th minute
Jason Knight forced Hradecky into a stop in the opening stages of the second half
Others: The Republic of Ireland secured their first away win in the UEFA Nations League campaign
Ireland will travel to Athens for the second match in this international window where they face Greece
